bayou.http

Class HttpAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayou.http.HttpAccess

  • public class HttpAccess
extends Object
    An entry in http access log.

    Each HttpAccess is passed to the accessLogger to be logged.

    See toCombinedLogFormat() and toCommonLogFormat() for some commonly used output formats.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HttpRequest request
      The http request.
      HttpResponse response
      The http response.
      long responseBodySize
      The response body size.
      long timeRequestReceived
      The time when the request is received.
      long timeResponseBegins
      The time when the server starts to write the response.
      long timeResponseEnds
      The time when the server finishes writing the response.
      Exception responseError
      Error occurred during writing the response; null if none.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpAccess(HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response, long responseBodySize, long timeRequestReceived, long timeResponseBegins, long timeResponseEnds, Exception responseError)
      Create an HttpAccess instance.

        The http request.

      • response

        The http response.

        public final long responseBodySize
        The response body size. The value is unreliable if responseError!=null.

        public final long timeRequestReceived
        The time when the request is received.

        The time when the server starts to write the response.

        The time when the server finishes writing the response.

    • Method Detail

      • toCommonLogFormat

        public CharSequence toCommonLogFormat()
        Convert to "Common Log Format".

        Example: 

         127.0.0.1 - - [10/Oct/2000:13:55:36 -0700] "GET /apache_pb.gif HTTP/1.0" 200 2326

      • toCombinedLogFormat

        public CharSequence toCombinedLogFormat()
        Convert to "Combined Log Format".

        Example: 

         127.0.0.1 - - [10/Oct/2000:13:55:36 -0700] "GET /apache_pb.gif HTTP/1.0" 200 2326 "http://www.example.com/start.html" "Mozilla/4.08 [en] (Win98; I ;Nav)"
